item.sql: CREATE SEQUENCE key_sequence START WITH 1 INCREMENT BY 1

CREATE TABLE dataobject ( dbkey BIGINT DEFAULT (NEXT VALUE FOR key_sequence) NOT NULL, objecttype VARCHAR(255), datecreated TIMESTAMP, properties CLOB, version UUID DEFAULT RANDOM_UUID(), id UUID DEFAULT RANDOM_UUID(), latest BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, PRIMARY KEY (dbkey) )
CREATE TABLE namedobject ( dbkey BIGINT NOT NULL, name CLOB, description CLOB, markup CLOB, files CLOB, lastmodified TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (dbkey) )

CREATE TABLE projectinfo ( dbkey BIGINT NOT NULL, lastedited TIMESTAMP, directory CLOB, backupdirectory CLOB, status CLOB, type VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'normal' NOT NULL, statistics CLOB, encrypted BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, nocredentials BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, icon CLOB, foreditor CLOB, PRIMARY KEY (dbkey) )
CREATE TABLE actionlog ( onobjectdbkey BIGINT, when TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, message CLOB, changes BLOB, digest CLOB )
CREATE TABLE info ( schema_version SMALLINT DEFAULT 1 )
